alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; McClain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 6:57PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cleveland and northwestern McClain Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 655 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong shower near Newcastle, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Western Norman and Newcastle. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 110 and 113. Interstate 44 between mile markers 102 and 108. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This shower may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
